thread.title: Venture Capitalists Talk About the Big Investments They Didn’t Make

author: Rob Curran
title: Venture Capitalists Talk About the Big Investments They Didn’t Make
text:
Being a venture capitalist means placing bets. Sometimes you hit it big with a startup. Sometimes you lose everything.
But sometimes you never place a bet at all—and end up missing out on an idea that turns out to be a multibillion-dollar winner.
One long-established venture-capital firm, Bessemer Venture Partners, lists its multibillion-dollar...
